unnormalised: Yeah, they messed up my delivery again! Sent it to 12A Gandhi Nagar instead of 12B, luckily the neighbour bhaiyya called me. Pin code 560001, Bangalore needs better service!
normalised: Yeah, they messed up my delivery again! Sent it to twelve A Gandhi Nagar instead of twelve B, luckily the neighbour bhaiyya called me. Pin code five six zero zero zero one, Bangalore needs better service!
